edu.rit.swing

Class FileTypeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • edu.rit.swing.FileTypeFilter

  • public class FileTypeFilter
extends FileFilter
    Class FileTypeFilter implements a Swing file filter that accepts only files whose file name matches a specified suffix.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileTypeFilter()
      Construct a new file type filter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(File f)
      Determine whether this file type filter accepts the given file.
      String getDescription()
      Get a description of the files this file type filter accepts.
      void setType(String theExtension, String theDescription)
      Set the file extension that this file type filter will accept.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTypeFilter

        public FileTypeFilter()
        Construct a new file type filter. Initially, the file type filter has no file type set.

    • Method Detail

      • setType

        public void setType(String theExtension,
           String theDescription)
        Set the file extension that this file type filter will accept. Any file whose file name ends with theExtension (case insensitive) will be accepted.
        Parameters:
        theExtension - File extension, e.g. ".png".
        theDescription - Description of files accepted, e.g. "PNG image files".

      • accept

        public boolean accept(File f)
        Determine whether this file type filter accepts the given file.
        Specified by:
        accept in class FileFilter
        Parameters:
        f - File.
        Returns:
        True if f is accepted, false otherwise.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Get a description of the files this file type filter accepts.
        Specified by:
        getDescription in class FileFilter
        Returns:
        Description.
